subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James’s and the Cavaliers’ postseason hopes went up in talc, shoved aside by the towering play of Dwight Howard and buried under a barrage of 3-point shots.
snippet: LeBron James’s and the Cavaliers’ postseason hopes went up in talc, shoved aside by the towering play of Dwight Howard and buried under a barrage of 3-point shots.
